title: Tamagotchi! Miracle Friends
synopsis: In the new series, Miraitchi and Kururutchi, twin sisters who dream of becoming designers, travel from the future back in time to modern-day Dream Town. (Their names are a wordplay on the Japanese words for "future" and "miracle.")
staff: [['Shimura, Jouji', ['Director']], ['Kugimiya, Rie', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Saitou, Chiwa', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Katou, Emiri', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
